name: Super Nidhogg Falltower of Gun Actress Again Ultimate III: 3rd Strike: The Movie[cl-r] Turbo Da ! Kyanta 2 (Get KoF XV)
name_original: Super Nidhogg Falltower of Gun Actress Again Ultimate III: 3rd Strike: The Movie[cl-r] Turbo Da ! Kyanta 2 (Get KoF XV)
description:
Team: Austen Ariniello, Matthew Nguyen, Faris Alotaibi

Two player platform fighter. You can hover in midair. There used to be double jumps, but it looked and sounded weird so now we have wizard ghost jetpacks.

ActionP1P2ControllerMovement / AimWASDCursor keys
D-padJump / HoverCSpaceA/Cross / LB/L1SlashFCommaX/SquareShoot / ReloadGPeriodY/TriangleParryHSlashB/Circle / RB/R1

also btw nintendo switch controllers have their button layout flipped so A <=> B and X <=> Y
